content:
Amazingly, when I'm away for a week things get backlogged. So only today did I get this done, about @John Keyes <= I hope that's the right John Keyes!

And the Patient Innovation winner is …
It is the right one — thanks Dave!

It is the right one — thanks Dave!

@John Keyes Patient Empowerment Workgroup meets 11AM Eastern on Thursdays - would you like to join us?
@Virginia Lorenzi Thanks Virginia -- yes I would. This Thursday I probably have a conflict unfortunately, but could join starting the following week.
